assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use '@phosphor-icons/react' for feature illustrations if needed.

general: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Implement a 'Step-based' progress indicator for the video generation pipeline.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.

pages.landing: Create a high-impact hero section. Use the 'hero_background' image. Feature grid should use Bento layout.
pages.dashboard: Clean list of projects. Use a 'Create New' button with primary color.
pages.script_editor: Minimalist text area. Auto-save indicator. Split view for scene preview.
pages.scene_manager: Card-based layout. Each card represents a scene with 'Edit', 'Regenerate Image', 'Preview Video' actions.
pages.video_generation: Show progress clearly. Use the 'ai_generation_placeholder' image while processing.

anti_patterns: No purple or teal for CTAs (Use Indigo/Violet).

universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Do NOT apply universal transition (e.g., transition: all).
Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
